org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeProcessCoordination

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeProcessCoordinationStub, AeServerProcessCoordination
public interface IAeProcessCoordination

Interface that is responsible for handling coordination operations related to the process.

Method Summary
 void activityFaulted(long aProcessId, java.lang.String aLocationPath, java.lang.String aCoordinationId, IAeFault aFault)
          Indicates the coordinated activity faulted.
 void cancelProcess(long aProcessId)
          Cancels (terminates) process.
 void cancelSubProcessCompensation(long aProcessId)
          Terminates the subprocess's compensation handler if it is currently executing.
 void compensateSubProcess(long aProcessId, java.lang.String aCoordinationId, long aJournalId)
          Compensates a sub process (participant).
 void compensationCompletedCallback(long aProcessId, java.lang.String aLocationPath, java.lang.String aCoordinationId)
          Handles the callback when a coordinated compensation has completed.
 void compensationCompletedWithFaultCallback(long aProcessId, java.lang.String aLocationPath, java.lang.String aCoordinationId, IAeFault aFault)
          Handles the callback when a coordinated compensation has faulted.
 void deregisterCoordinationId(long aProcessId, java.lang.String aLocationPath, java.lang.String aCoordinationId)
          Deregisters the coordination id from process invoke activity's enclosing scope.
 void installCompensationHandler(long aProcessId, java.lang.String aLocationPath, java.lang.String aCoordinationId, IAeCoordinator aCoordinator)
          Installs a AeCoordinatorCompInfo object into the enclosing scope.
 void registerCoordinationId(long aProcessId, java.lang.String aLocationPath, java.lang.String aCoordinationId)
          Registers the coordination id with process invoke activity's enclosing scope.
 void subprocessCoordinationEnded(long aProcessId)
          Signals that the sub process coordination has ended.

subprocessCoordinationEnded

public void subprocessCoordinationEnded(long aProcessId)
                                 throws AeCoordinationException
Signals that the sub process coordination has ended. The process identified by the process id will not be compensated.

Throws:
AeCoordinationException
